Duterte asks Congress to revive death penalty vs. drug crimes tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-748667 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/748667/duterte-asks-congress-to-revive-death-penalty-vs-drug-crimes/story/ His call for death penalty renewal, however, did not earn a loud applause from the lawmakers. “I did not hear much applause, I suppose they are not interested,” Duterte said. Mon, 27 Jul 2020 17:22:51 +0800
TV frequencies reverted to gov't to be used for 'uninterrupted, quality education' --Duterte tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-748666 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/748666/tv-frequencies-reverted-to-gov-t-to-be-used-for-uninterrupted-quality-education-duterte/story/ President Rodrigo Duterte on Monday said TV frequencies that will be returned to the government will be used for the "uninterrupted, quality education" of students amid the new normal environment brought about by the COVID-19 pandemic. Mon, 27 Jul 2020 17:15:19 +0800
Philippines in a "strong" fiscal position to weather COVID-19, Duterte claims tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-748665 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/748665/philippines-in-a-strong-fiscal-position-to-weather-covid-19-duterte-claims/story/ "Our fiscal position is strong, our economic fiscal management prudent, and our banking system robust. We are in a better position to weather the crisis caused by COVID-19 global pandemic," President Rodrigo Duterte said. Mon, 27 Jul 2020 17:15:01 +0800
Duterte urges lessors: Now it's time to be fair, compassionate tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-748664 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/748664/duterte-urges-lessors-now-it-s-time-to-be-fair-compassionate/story/ President Rodrigo Duterte on Monday urged lessors to be "fair and compassionate" to their tenants, including small businesses that had to shut down because of the COVID-19 lockdown. Mon, 27 Jul 2020 17:14:16 +0800
Duterte calls on Filipinos to visit local destinations to boost economy amid COVID-19 tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-748660 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/748660/duterte-calls-on-filipinos-to-visit-local-destinations-to-boost-economy-amid-covid-19/story/ President Rodrigo Duterte has called on the public to travel to local tourist destinations to boost the country s economy, which has been hard-hit by the COVID-19 pandemic. Mon, 27 Jul 2020 17:09:42 +0800
Duterte to gov t agencies: Make queueing a thing of the past tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-748663 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/748663/duterte-to-gov-t-agencies-make-queueing-a-thing-of-the-past/story/ "I reiterate my call for all government instrumentalities to implement systems that shall make physical queueing a thing of the past," Duterte said during his 5th State of the Nation Address. "Panahon na para mawala ang pila para mapagsilbihan ng gobyerno nang walang kahirapan para sa tao," he added. Mon, 27 Jul 2020 17:06:34 +0800
Duterte says his administration 'will not dodge' human rights obligation tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-748659 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/748659/duterte-says-his-administration-will-not-dodge-human-rights-obligation/story/ "My administration always believed that freedom from illegal drugs, terrorism, corruption and criminality is itself a human right violation," President Rodrigo Duterte said in his fifth State of the Nation Address. Mon, 27 Jul 2020 16:59:23 +0800
Duterte calls on Congress to pass proposed Bayanihan to Recover As One Act tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-748658 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/748658/duterte-calls-on-congress-to-pass-proposed-bayanihan-to-recover-as-one-act/story/ "I hope that we can get some of the same treatment of clarity of purpose and the fastness to support the passage of the Bayanihan to Recover as One which is supplement funds for the recovery and response against the impact of COVID-19 pandemic," President Rodrigo Duterte said. Mon, 27 Jul 2020 16:57:48 +0800
Duterte claims vaccine vs. COVID-19 'just around the corner' tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-748657 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/748657/duterte-claims-vaccine-vs-covid-19-just-around-the-corner/story/ A vaccine for COVID-19 is "just around the corner," President Rodrigo Duterte claimed in his fifth State of the Nation Address (SONA) on Monday, as he urged Filipinos not to despair even amid the pandemic. Mon, 27 Jul 2020 16:57:03 +0800
ABS-CBN workers, supporters hold short protest ahead of Duterte s SONA tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-748655 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/748655/abs-cbn-workers-supporters-hold-short-protest-ahead-of-duterte-s-sona/story/ Several ABS-CBN workers and supporters, led by the Association of Major Religious Superiors in the Philippines, on Monday morning held a short protest in front of ABS-CBN ahead of President Rodrigo Duterte s fifth State of the Nation Address. Mon, 27 Jul 2020 16:53:52 +0800
1,657 new cases push Philippines COVID-19 tally over 82,000 tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-748641 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/748641/1-657-new-cases-push-philippines-covid-19-tally-over-82-000/story/ There are now more than 82,000 Filipinos infected with the coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) after the Department of Health (DOH) announced 1,657 new cases on Monday, bringing the total to 82,040. Mon, 27 Jul 2020 16:40:37 +0800

Duterte to DSWD, DILG: Look into jeepney drivers' complaints amid COVID-19 pandemic tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-748653 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/748653/duterte-to-dswd-dilg-look-into-claims-of-jeepney-drivers-who-got-zero-gov-t-aid/story/ President Rodrigo Duterte has tasked the Department of the Interior and Local Government (DILG) and the Department of Social Welfare and Development (DSWD) to look into the claims of jeepney drivers who did not receive cash assistance from the government amid the COVID-10 pandemic. Duterte thanks Bong Go for Malasakit Center Law during SONA tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-748651 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/748651/duterte-thanks-bong-go-for-malasakit-center-law-during-sona/story/ President Rodrigo Duterte on Monday gave a shout-out to his former aide now Senator Christopher Bong Go over the passage of the Malasakit Center Law -- the brainchild of the legislator. Mon, 27 Jul 2020 16:23:34 +0800
Duterte opens 2020 SONA with tirade on ABS-CBN owners tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-748650 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/748650/duterte-opens-2020-sona-with-tirade-on-abs-cbn-owners/story/ President Rodrigo Duterte on Monday started his fifth State of the Nation Address (SONA) with a criticism on the Lopez family, which owns ABS-CBN Corporation.
